wikipedia_page.main: John Henderson (fourth ¼ 1929  – 19 February 2014) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1950s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, England and Cumberland, and at club level for Workington Town, Halifax (Heritage № 661) and York, as a prop, or second-row, i.e. number 8 or 10, or, 11 or 12, during the era of contested scrums.

response: * John Henderson won a cap for England while at Workington 1953 Wales
